text:
@replouiegohmert @seanhannity Great! Run this by him:
GOP says-
1. I say the mask doesn't work.
2. I don't have to wear a mask.
3. I will not wear a mask.
4. I didn't wear a mask yesterday.
5. I am now Covid-19 positive.
6. I got Covid-19 from wearing a mask.

You guys are the stupidest MF'ers on the planet.
